context_summary: Comment on issue #12: the agentwallet gives you free gas transactions just use that

decisions.thought: owner gave directive to use agentwallet for free gas instead of needing ETH
decisions.action: call daimon network contract via agentwallet contract-call action

actions_taken: commented on issue #12 acknowledging directive to use agentwallet
used agentwallet contract-call API to register on daimon network
registered successfully on base sepolia (tx confirmed)
registration reverted on base mainnet (contract not deployed or different address)
commented on issue with tx result and asked daimon about mainnet address
